Class ClockPolicy<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClockPolicy<K>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReplacementPolicy<K>

    public final class ClockPolicy<K>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReplacementPolicy<K>
    A cache policy implementing the clock algorithm.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClockPolicy(int cap)
      Creates a new clock queue with capacity capacity.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int capacity()
      Returns the capacity of the cache.
      K require(K item)
      Informs the policy manager that a particular item is required and must be brought into the cache if not already there.
      int size()
      Returns the number of items currently in the cache.

      • require

        public K require(K item)
        Description copied from interface: ReplacementPolicy
        Informs the policy manager that a particular item is required and must be brought into the cache if not already there. Returns the evicted item if eviction is required to make room, or null otherwise.

        Must run in O(capacity()) time.

        Specified by:
        require in interface ReplacementPolicy<K>
        Parameters:
        item - the required item (non-null)
        Returns:
        the evicted item or null
